question: Your ball is on a cart path so you decide to move it and take relief. What can you do? *

choices.text: Move the ball two big steps away from the path and play without adding any shots
Find the nearest place where you can play without the path being in the way, then drop the ball within 1 club length from that spot
Drop the ball 2 club lengths from where the ball is

explanation: You normally get free relief from a cart path, but when you take your next shot you must be completely clear of the path (you cant even be standing on it). Find the nearest place where you are no longer affected by it and drop within 1 club length of that spot no closer to the hole.
